plugins.name: dataprocessing
plugins.description: Data manipulation and processing capabilities including JSON parsing, hashing, and data transformation.

plugins.name: filesystem
plugins.description: File system manipulation capabilities including read, write, and directory operations.

plugins.name: lead_audit
plugins.description: Deterministic lead scoring and prioritization for decision bottleneck product.

plugins.name: mission_contract
plugins.description: Converts 12 laws into hard preflight validation. Enforces minimum required fields and external signal requirements.

plugins.name: reality_gate
plugins.description: Ensures SWARMZ only learns and mutates based on external signals, not internal reflections.

skills.name: artifact_management
skills.description: Create, store, retrieve, and manage artifact packs produced by the SWARMZ factory.

skills.name: data_analysis
skills.description: Analyze structured data, compute statistics, and identify patterns.

skills.name: file_operations
skills.description: Read, write, and manage files in the operator's workspace.

skills.name: mission_execution
skills.description: Execute a validated mission contract through the SWARMZ runtime.

skills.name: nexusmon_interact
skills.description: Interact with the Nexusmon avatar - absorb data, execute directives, and receive results.
